_source.text: After an afternoon at Wrigley Field watching the Cubbies, there wasn't much better than riding the Red Line down to Division Street and picking up some of that famous fried chicken.

text: After an afternoon at **Wrigley** **Field** watching the Cubbies, there wasn't much **better** **than** riding the
**Red** Line down to Division Street and picking up some of that famous fried chicken.
